title: Greek Couscous Salad
ingredients: ['515g lemon and garlic couscous mix (or any flavour you prefer)', '300g cherry tomatoes, cut in half', '1/2 (290g) jar pitted kalamata olives, halved', '150g mixed peppers (green, red, yellow, orange), diced', '1 cucumber, sliced and then halved', '30g fresh parsley, finely chopped', '225g crumbled feta cheese', 'For the Dressing', '6 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon dried oregano, crushed', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'pinch of pepper to taste']
